text: A Starship prototype tank failed during a cryogenic proof test. The structure did not hold pressure, and the vehicle was lost on the test stand.

sources.title: SN1 tank test structural failure
sources.source_summary: Source URL missing; add official report or webcast recap.

text: A Starship prototype collapsed during a cryogenic propellant test. The vehicle could not maintain structural integrity under pressurization.

sources.title: SN3 cryogenic test collapse
sources.source_summary: Source URL missing; add official report or webcast recap.

text: After completing a static fire, a Starship prototype experienced a destructive event on the test stand, resulting in vehicle loss and damage around the pad.

sources.title: SN4 static fire anomaly

text: A test tank article failed during cryogenic testing, indicating structural limits were exceeded and ending the test early.

sources.title: SN7.1 test tank structural failure

text: A high-altitude prototype flight achieved the planned ascent and descent profile, but the vehicle failed to land softly and was lost on impact.

sources.title: SN8 flight test landing failure

text: A high-altitude prototype flight ended with a hard landing and vehicle loss after the final descent maneuver did not achieve a stable touchdown.

incident_name: Starship SN10 landing hard and post-landing explosion
text: A high-altitude prototype completed a landing but touched down hard and was later lost on the pad, indicating a failure in the landing sequence.

incident_name: Starship SN11 landing failure with telemetry loss
text: During a high-altitude prototype flight, telemetry was lost and the vehicle did not complete a safe landing, resulting in vehicle loss.

text: A high-altitude prototype flight completed the planned profile and achieved a controlled landing, demonstrating recovery success.

text: During a Super Heavy static fire, one or more engines did not perform as expected, and the test ended early with an engine shutdown.

text: A booster test resulted in a fire in the engine bay area, prompting test termination and inspection of ground support equipment.
